p: In conclusion, the best stage to harvest ginger rhizomes for higher essential oil weight yield was at 5 months maturity. In addition, ginger essential oil weight yield was decreasing with increasing maturity stage. Both Rangoon and Siddha varieties were recommended for high oil weight yield under Sri Lankan conditions. Makandura area was the best geographical location in Sri Lanka to plant Rangoon variety for maximum oil yields. Siddha variety can be recommended to be cultivated in both the geographical locations Makandura and Alawwa. Considering chemical intensities of major peaks in the GEO fraction, Siddha variety yielded the best qualitative GEO chemical profile at 5 months maturity stage.
